Daly_City.KCSM-TV: KCSM-TV, virtual channel 60 (UHF digital channel 43), is a non-commercial educational independent television station licensed to San Mateo, California, United States and serving the San Francisco Bay Area. The station is owned by the San Mateo County Community College District, alongside sister radio station KCSM (91.1 FM). The two stations share studios on the campus of the College of San Mateo on West Hillsdale Boulevard in San Mateo; KCSM-TV's transmitter is located atop Sutro Tower in San Francisco.
